sentences.en: Can you transpose this fugue into g major?
sentences.cn: 你能把这首赋格曲转变为G大调 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can you transpose this fugue into G major?
sentences.cn: 你能把这个赋格曲转换成G大调 吗 .

sentences.en: Dyslexics often transpose letters in a word.
sentences.cn: 诵读困难者经常改换话语的文字.

sentences.en: For sequenced sources, just transpose the track up a fifth.
sentences.cn: 为了达到有序的音源, 只要将音轨升到第五音即可.

sentences.en: Genetic engineers transpose or exchange bits of hereditary material from one organism to the next.
sentences.cn: 遗传工程师将某一生物的小段遗传物质调换到另一生物，或与其互换。

sentences.en: If A is the mxn matrix, then the nxm matrix is called the transpose of A.
sentences.cn: 如果A是mxn矩阵, 那么nxm矩阵为A的转置矩阵.

sentences.en: In the near future I may transpose these drawings to real size and sell the templates.
sentences.cn: 在不久的将来,我可能会转这些图纸和实际尺寸的模板,然后出售.

sentences.en: Many people inadvertently transpose digits of the ZIP code.
sentences.cn: 很多人疏忽之下会颠倒邮政编码中数字的顺序。

sentences.en: Now, transpose this analogy to the gasoline industry.
sentences.cn: 现在, 假使将这种理论,应用于石油工业上.

sentences.en: She could play any piece of music she heard and transpose it into any key.
sentences.cn: 她能把听过的任何乐曲变以任何调演奏出来。

sentences.en: The director transposes the action from sixteenth-century France to post-Civil War America.
sentences.cn: 导演把情节从16世纪的法国转换到内战后的美国。

sentences.en: These two positions are said to transpose to each other.
sentences.cn: 这两个位置(结果)就可以互换.

sentences.en: They have the unusual property of being able to move around or transpose.
sentences.cn: 它有一种不寻常的特性,能在基因组内来回移动,也称为转位.

sentences.en: Transpose these two words and the sentence will read right.
sentences.cn: 把这两个字颠倒过来句子就顺了.

sentences.en: Transpose: To change places with another letter, word, lie or illustration.
sentences.cn: 对调次序: 把字, 字词, 字行或插图的次序对调.

words.tran_cn: 转座的；可换位的；有换位可能的
调换；颠倒顺序；移项（transpore的过去分词）

trans.tran_en: to change the order or position of two or more things

trans.tran_cn: <数>移项，使变位，<音>使变调，变换顺序
